# Simple Language - Keyword Reference

*All keywords, sorted by category.*

*Generated by `bin/simple grammar-doc` from `doc/spec/grammar/grammar_keywords.sdn`.*

---

## Keywords

| Keyword | Category | Description |
|---------|----------|-------------|
| `fn` | declarations | Function definition |
| `val` | declarations | Immutable binding |
| `var` | declarations | Mutable binding |
| `struct` | declarations | Struct definition |
| `enum` | declarations | Enum definition |
| `class` | declarations | Class definition (struct with methods) |
| `impl` | declarations | Method implementation block |
| `extern` | declarations | External function declaration (FFI) |
| `use` | declarations | Module import |
| `export` | declarations | Symbol export |
| `import` | declarations | Module import (deprecated, use use) |
| `trait` | declarations | Trait definition |
| `pub` | declarations | Public visibility modifier |
| `static` | declarations | Static method or binding |
| `me` | declarations | Mutable self method |
| `type` | declarations | Type alias |
| `implements` | declarations | Trait implementation declaration |
| `const` | declarations | Compile-time constant |
| `mod` | declarations | Module definition |
| `asm` | declarations | Inline assembly block |
| `unit` | declarations | Unit type definition |
| `unsafe` | declarations | Unsafe block |
| `shared` | declarations | GPU shared memory |
| `bitfield` | declarations | Packed bit struct |
| `kernel` | declarations | GPU kernel function |
| `actor` | declarations | Actor definition (concurrency) |
| `if` | control_flow | Conditional branch |
| `elif` | control_flow | Else-if branch |
| `else` | control_flow | Else branch |
| `for` | control_flow | For loop |
| `while` | control_flow | While loop |
| `match` | control_flow | Pattern match expression |
| `case` | control_flow | Match arm |
| `return` | control_flow | Return from function |
| `break` | control_flow | Break out of loop |
| `continue` | control_flow | Skip to next iteration |
| `in` | control_flow | Membership / iteration operator |
| `loop` | control_flow | Infinite loop |
| `pass` | control_flow | No-op placeholder |
| `pass_todo` | control_flow | Unimplemented placeholder (TODO) |
| `pass_do_nothing` | control_flow | Intentional no-op |
| `pass_dn` | control_flow | Alias for pass_do_nothing |
| `and` | control_flow | Logical AND |
| `or` | control_flow | Logical OR |
| `not` | control_flow | Logical NOT |
| `self` | control_flow | Current instance reference |
| `is` | control_flow | Type check operator |
| `as` | control_flow | Type cast operator |
| `from` | control_flow | Import source specifier |
| `async` | control_flow | Async function modifier |
| `await` | control_flow | Await async expression |
| `yield` | control_flow | Yield from generator |
| `spawn` | control_flow | Spawn actor/task |
| `try` | control_flow | Try block (error handling) |
| `catch` | control_flow | Catch block (error handling) |
| `throw` | control_flow | Throw exception |
| `with` | control_flow | Context manager block |
| `finally` | control_flow | Finally block (always runs) |
| `panic` | control_flow | Panic / unrecoverable error |
| `xor` | control_flow | Bitwise XOR operator |
| `true` | expressions | Boolean true literal |
| `false` | expressions | Boolean false literal |
| `nil` | expressions | Null/none value |
| `super` | expressions | Parent module reference |
| `Some` | expressions | Option type wrapper |
| `Ok` | expressions | Result success wrapper |
| `Err` | expressions | Result error wrapper |
| `None` | expressions | Option empty value |
| `loss` | expressions | Neural network loss block |
| `nograd` | expressions | Disable gradient computation |

## Operators

| Name | Symbol |
|------|--------|
| plus | `+` |
| minus | `-` |
| star | `*` |
| slash | `/` |
| percent | `%` |
| star_star | `**` |
| shl | `<<` |
| shr | `>>` |
| eq | `==` |
| not_eq | `!=` |
| lt | `<` |
| gt | `>` |
| lt_eq | `<=` |
| gt_eq | `>=` |
| assign | `=` |
| plus_eq | `+=` |
| minus_eq | `-=` |
| star_eq | `*=` |
| slash_eq | `/=` |
| percent_eq | `%=` |
| walrus | `:=` |
| ampersand | `&` |
| pipe | `|` |
| caret | `^` |
| tilde | `~` |
| question | `?` |
| question_dot | `?.` |
| question_question | `??` |
| dot_question | `.?` |
| pipe_forward | `|>` |
| compose | `>>` |
| dot_dot | `..` |
| dot_dot_eq | `..=` |
| dot_plus | `.+` |
| dot_minus | `.-` |
| dot_star | `.*` |
| dot_slash | `./` |
| dot_caret | `.^` |
| at | `@` |
| triple_less | `<<<` |
| triple_greater | `>>>` |
| layer_connect | `~>` |
